Correction: Impact of CD4 T cells on intratumoral CD8 T- cell exhaustion and responsiveness to PD- 1 blockade therapy in mouse brain tumors
Khan SM, Desai R, Coxon A, et al. Impact of CD4 T cells on intratumoral CD8 T- cell exhaustion and responsiveness to PD- 1 blockade therapy in mouse brain tumors. J Immunother Cancer 2022;10:e005293. doi: 10.1136/jitc- 2022- 005293
SMK and RD have been listed as joint first authors. GPD, AP and TMJ have been listed as joint senior authors.
